Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicPlayer, ChangeResPlayer, DiscountedPlayer, ExtraDepositPlayer, ExtraProdPlayer
public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
The type representing a player of the game.

It is an abstract class used by almost every method that involves a player. It is always related to an instantiable type of player through its original attribute. Every method, when called, calls the relative original's method which can be differently implemented based on the original's type.

    • addLeaderCard

      public void addLeaderCard​(LeaderCard card)
      Adds LeaderCards to the player. Called at the beginning of the match when the player chooses two out of the four leader cards.
      Parameters:
      card - the card that needs to be added to the player.

    • checkSpace

      public boolean checkSpace​(Resource res, int level)
      Check if player has space in the received as parameter level in his deposits.
      Parameters:
      res - the Resource.
      level - the level in the deposits
      Returns:
      true if there's space, false otherwise.

      Parameters:
      level - the level of deposits.
      res - the Resource.

    • removeResource

      Remove the Resource from the place received as parameter.
      Parameters:

      res - the Resource.

      Returns:

    • checkMarketRes

      public boolean checkMarketRes​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> requestedRes, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> marketRes)
      Check if all the Resources in the MarketResources sent by the player in his MarketRequest match the relatives Resources in the market; it also considered if player has played or not a ChangeResource LeaderCard.
      Parameters:
      requestedRes - the requested resources from the player.
      marketRes - the market resource actually in the market.
      Returns:
      true if the resources match or if the player has the right ChangeResource LeaderCard, false otherwise.

    • checkLevel

      public boolean checkLevel​(int level)
      Check if the player actually has the level received as parameter in his deposit, considering even the possible extra deposit.
      Parameters:
      level - the level
      Returns:
      the boolean

    • getAllResources

      public java.util.ArrayList<Resource> getAllResources()
      Gets all player's resources contained in his WareHouse, his StrongBox, even, if present, the extra deposits.
      Returns:
      all the Resources.

    • switchLevels

      public void switchLevels​(int originLevel, int destLevel)
      Called when the player wants to move Resources in his WareHouse, considering even the possible extra deposits. It moves resource from an level to another in the player's deposits.
      Parameters:
      originLevel - the origin level
      destLevel - the dest level

    • canBuy

      public boolean canBuy​(DevCard devCard, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> allPlayerRes)
      Given a DevCard on the Table, check if the player can buy it based on his Resource and the possible Discounts he could have.
      Parameters:
      devCard - the development card it wants to buy.
      allPlayerRes - all player's resources,
      Returns:
      true if the player can buy the card, false otherwise.

    • getLeaderFromID

      public LeaderCard getLeaderFromID​(java.lang.String cardID)
      Get the LeaderCard having the ID received as parameter searching between those the player owns.
      Parameters:
      cardID - the leader card's ID.
      Returns:
      the reference to the LeaderCard, null if the player doesn't own it.
